word_mean: 药剂师，调剂员：具有执照，准许制备、出售或配发药品的人

sentence.Network_en: Always ask the pharmacist for help.
He worked awhile as a pharmacist in Cincinnati.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有一段时间在辛辛那提当药剂师。

sentence.Network_en: We had to wait for the pharmacist to make up her prescription.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们只得等药剂师给她配好药。

entry.def: A pharmacist is a person who is qualified to prepare and sell medicines.
A pharmacist or a pharmacist's is a shop in which drugs and medicines are sold by a pharmacist.

means.word_mean: 1. a health professional trained in the art of preparing and dispensing drugs

auth_sentence.content: Wax-softening drops can also be bought from a pharmacist.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wax-softening drops can also be bought from a pharmacist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wax-softening drops can also be bought from a pharmacist.

auth_sentence.content: These are available from your pharmacist without prescription.

auth_sentence.content: Stool-softening treatments are also available from the pharmacist.

sentences.en: The pharmacist carefully measured out a dose of herbal medicine and told me how to brew it.
sentences.cn: 药剂师仔细地配好一服草药,并告诉我煎药的方法。
